title: Standardise on PostgreSQL
description: PostgreSQL is a powerful, open-source relational database that supports ACID guarantees and has strong transactional support.

arguments.argument: May not be the best choice for document-oriented workloads

title: Standardise on MongoDB
description: MongoDB is a popular, open-source NoSQL database that supports flexible schema and high performance.

arguments.argument: May not support strong ACID guarantees

title: Allow teams to choose their own strategy
description: This option allows each team to select the best database solution for their specific needs, but may lead to tool sprawl and increased complexity.

arguments.argument: Teams can choose the best solution for their workload
May lead to unnecessary tool sprawl
